attributes.action: Review legislation on the use of fireworks and limit them to specific days only
attributes.additional_details: Limit the days fireworks can be set off to bonfire night, new years eve and public displays or reduce the noise decibels to a mandatory level to reduce stress.
attributes.background: Stop members of the public setting off fireworks any time of the year, frightening animals and those with ptsd, fireworks are set off from October-December with no limitations, it needs to be addressed as those with animals cannot prepare, when not knowing when the next bang will be.

rejection.details:
We currently have petitions open which are calling for a similar action. You may wish to sign the following:

Ban sale of fireworks to the public and limit sales to licensed displays only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868

Reduce the decibel limit on fireworks to 85 decibels, to reduce impact
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622900
